articles.title: Will Zalatoris withdraws from BMW Championship with back injury
articles.description: Will Zalatoris withdrew during the third round of BMW Championship on Saturday due to a back injury.
articles.content:
Will Zalatoris withdrew during the third round of BMW Championship on Saturday due to a back injury.

articles.title: New York Mets RHP Taijuan Walker scratched from start due to back injury
articles.description: Mets righty Taijuan Walker has been scratched from his scheduled start Sunday as he deals with a bulging disk. Walker left his last start in the third inning due to back spasms
articles.content:
New York Mets pitcher Taijuan Walker has been scratched from Sunday's start due to a bulging disk, manager Buck Showalter said Saturday.

articles.title: Chelsea ban season ticket holder for racist abuse directed at Tottenham's Son Heung-Min
articles.description: Chelsea have banned a season ticket holder after Tottenham Hotspur's Son Heung-Min was subjected to racist abuse at Stamford Bridge last weekend.
articles.content:
Chelsea have announced they have banned a supporter for racist abuse. Catherine Ivill/Getty Images

articles.title: Houston Astros' Triple-A affiliate goes off in 17-run inning
articles.description: The Sugar Land Space Cowboys, the Houston Astros' Triple-A affiliate, scored 17 runs in one inning Friday night in their 21-4 win over the Oklahoma City Dodgers.

articles.description: Former Boston Red Sox star Bill Lee collapsed in the bullpen while warming up for the Savannah Bananas amateur team Friday night, but the 75-year-old pitcher walked off the field with assistance.
